===Overview===
The ''' Durammi  ''' is a [[human]] agrarian tribe of humans living in a peaceful valley in the [[Savage Land]].

===Events===
Allied with the [[Cliff Forest People|People of the Forest]] against an unidentified barbarian tribe, they were saved from the barbarians by [[Edward Culhaney (Earth-616)|Edward Culhaney]] and [[Kevin Plunder (Earth-616)|Ka-Zar]]{{r|Savage Tales #10}}.
